net.zzh.common.util

类 LinkUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.zzh.common.util.LinkUtil

  • public final class LinkUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides some constants and utility methods to build a Link Header to be stored in the HttpServletResponse object

      • createLinkHeader

        public static java.lang.String createLinkHeader(java.lang.String uri,
                                                java.lang.String rel)
        Creates a Link Header to be stored in the HttpServletResponse to provide Discoverability features to the user
        参数:
        uri - the base uri
        rel - the relative path
        返回:
        the complete url
